Call, email or submit an inquiry today to learn more! 4952 Centre Pointe Dr Suite 110, North Charleston, SC 29418 map marker pin order Take us home with you Our menu, wherever you want it Pickup DoorDash UberEats GrubHub Catering Catering made easy Let us bring the flavor to your event cater inquire now Reservations Halal Restaurant in North Charleston Click the button below to make a reservation Reserve Reviews Review by - Yelp Shahad A: This is the best place in Charleston to get authentic Arabic food and groceries. The staff are amazing and very friendly, highly recommended!! Review by - Yelp Daniela Z: I love this spot! Everything is fresh and they are always so kind and friendly. I forgot to take a picture of the pistachio baklava which was also DELICIOUS. Review by - Yelp Sheila K: Amazing! We ordered chicken kabob platters with an order of hummus. We are not disappointed. The food is fresh and flavorful. Review by - Yelp Lauren K: This place is so authentic and amazing!! They are so friendly and their food is always cooked to order and so delicious, I would eat here every day if I could, you have to try their hummus too it's the best Review by - Yelp Courtney U: My husband has been deployed where they had food like this and he was craving it and we found this place. The staff is so friendly and the food honestly makes me cry it's so so good...
